Data Fields
pmhalClkDomain Struct Reference

Structure defining the clock domain. These parameters define the properties of the clock domain and enable clock domain control. More...

#include <hw_pmhal_data.h>

Data Fields

pmhalPrcmPdId_t powerDomainId
 
uint32_t clkStCtrlAddr
 
pmhalPrcmModuleId_t * pFirstModPtr
 
uint32_t staticDepAddr
 
uint8_t staticDepCdShift
 
uint8_t numModulesInCd
 
uint8_t clkDomainCapability
 

Detailed Description

Structure defining the clock domain. These parameters define the properties of the clock domain and enable clock domain control.

Field Documentation

uint8_t pmhalClkDomain::clkDomainCapability

Bit map indicating the capability of the clock domain. It can take any of the values from pmhalPrcmCdClkTrnModes_t

uint32_t pmhalClkDomain::clkStCtrlAddr

Clock state(gated/ungated) status control register address.

uint8_t pmhalClkDomain::numModulesInCd

Number of modules in the clock domain.

pmhalPrcmModuleId_t* pmhalClkDomain::pFirstModPtr

Pointer to module array which has list of modules belonging to this clock domain.

pmhalPrcmPdId_t pmhalClkDomain::powerDomainId

Power domain ID to which clock domain belongs to.

uint32_t pmhalClkDomain::staticDepAddr

Static Dependency register base address

uint8_t pmhalClkDomain::staticDepCdShift

Shift value of the clock domain in the other clock domain static dependency registers
